Painting.name: Almond Blossom
Painting.reason: I love Vincent Willem van Gogh when i was young. This painting create a joy of spring.
Painting.description: It is pinted in 1980 in French. Flowering trees were special to van Gogh. They represented awakening and hope. He enjoyed them aesthetically and found joy in painting flowering trees.

Hotpot.name: Spicy Hotpot
Hotpot.reason: I love spicy food very much and hotpot is delicious and convenient!
Hotpot.description: While a hot pot full of flavored broth is kept simmering, raw ingredients are placed into the pot and are cooked in a manner similar to fondue.

Book.name: Pride and Prejudice
Book.reason: I love Pride and Prejudice because it is a classic love story and it set the pattern for a modern popular love story.
Book.description: Pride and Prejudice follows the turbulent relationship between Elizabeth Bennet, the daughter of a country gentleman, and Fitzwilliam Darcy, a rich aristocratic landowner. They must overcome the titular sins of pride and prejudice in order to fall in love and marry.
